articles.title: Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Participants of 1st Reconnoitering Officers' Conference
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Participants of 1st Reconnoitering Officers' Conference
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, had a photo session with the participants of the 1st Reconnoitering Officers' Conference.
					 He highly praised the reconnoitering and intelligence officers and combatants of the KPA for dedicating their youth, families and lives to defending the most difficult and dangerous reconnoitering and intelligence front assigned by the party and leaving their praiseworthy traces on it.
					
					 Noting that the reconnoitering and intelligence officers and combatants who are devoting all their wisdom and enthusiasm without looking for any honor and appreciation are the staunch revolutionaries and genuine roots of the party, he stressed that the feats performed by them in reliably defending the socialist motherland would be always remembered by the party, the country and the people.
					
					 The 1st Reconnoitering Officers' Conference of the KPA marked an important occasion in bringing about a turning phase of preserving and eternally glorifying the immortal exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in the field of the reconnoitering and intelligence service and improving and strengthening the reconnoitering and intelligence service as required by the tense situation, he said.  Congratulating the participants on the successful conference, he had a photo session with them.
					
					 He was accompanied by Hwang Pyong So, Pak Yong Sik, Ri Yong Gil, Ryom Chol Song, Kim Yong Chol and Kim Rak Jun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Watches Firing Contest of AA Artillery Personnel
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Watches Firing Contest of AA Artillery Personnel
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, watched a firing contest of AA artillery personnel.
					 The contest brought together AA artillery companies under the KPA Air and Anti-Air Force, KPA Large Combined Units 963 and 526 and companies composed of instructors and cadets of the AA Artillery Academy.
					
					Standings of the contest were decided by the number of hits each company made by firing artillery pieces of different calibers at moving air, ground and naval targets in the order decided by lottery.
					
					 After receiving a report on the form and method of the contest at an observation post, Kim Jong Un gave an order to start it.
					
					 Then artillery pieces opened fire.
					
					 The AA Artillery Academy came first in the contest.
					
					 Praising the instructors and cadets of the academy, an icon unit and model unit to be proud of for distinguishing themselves in all aspects, Kim Jong Un called and met them and had a photo taken with them.
					
					 Noting that he made sure that instructors of the academy took part in the contest, in particular, he said it was because when the instructors of military academies are fully prepared not only in theory but also in practice, they can train their cadets to be stalwart officers.
					
					 He expressed satisfaction over the success made by the contest amid the high enthusiasm of its participants.
					
					 Stressing the need for the KPA to map out a plan for making good use of AA artillery pieces in the future, he called for steadily improving education and drill methods in order to thoroughly implement the policy set forth by the Party for developing the KPA into an army with superb tactics and turning all the branches of its arms into strong ones.
					
					 He underlined the need to conduct drills under the simulated conditions of an actual war, put them on a scientific and modern basis and frequently organize contests among units and sub-units in order to train all the soldiers to be master gunners capable of hitting any target without fail in any conditions and circumstances.
					
					 Stressing once again that drills are essential for bolstering up military capability, he indicated tasks to be fulfilled to round off the combat readiness of the KPA and increase its combat power in every way. 
					
					 Accompanying him were Choe Ryong Hae and O Il Jong.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Seychelles
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Seychelles
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Thursday sent a message of greeting to James Alix Michel, president of Seychelles, on its national day.
					 The message wished the president and people of Seychelles successes in their work for the stability and development of the country, expressing belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in various fields.

articles.title: Greetings to FM of Seychelles
articles.content:
Greetings to FM of Seychelles
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong Thursday sent a message of greeting to Jean-Paul Adam, foreign minister of Seychelles, on its national day.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger by the joint efforts of the foreign ministries of the two countries, the message wished the Seychellois foreign minister success in his work for the development of the country's foreign relations.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Tanzanian Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Tanzanian Ambassador
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, received credentials from Abdulrahaman Amiri Shimbo, Tanzanian ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday.

articles.title: DPRK Government Delegation Leaves for African Countries
articles.content:
DPRK Government Delegation Leaves for African Countries
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- A DPRK government delegation headed by Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong left here Thursday to visit some African countries.

articles.title: Taekwon-Do Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Taekwon-Do Delegation Leaves
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- A Taekwon-Do delegation headed by Leong Wai Meng, vice-president of the International Taekwon-Do Federation, flew back on Thursday after taking part in a memorial service marking the 13th anniversary of death of Choe Hong Hui, former president of the federation.

articles.title: National Meeting Marks 51st Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks 51st Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place here on Thursday to mark the 51st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju and other senior officials of the party, state and army, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, and officials of organs and industrial establishments, heroes, those who had the honor of being received by Kim Jong Il and  those of meritorious services in Pyongyang.
					
					 Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, made a report at the meeting.
					
					 June 19 when Kim Jong Il began his work at the WPK Central Committee, supreme staff of the Korean revolution marked a great revolutionary auspicious event of great historic significance in the development of the WPK and the revolution along with October 10, the founding day of the WPK, the reporter said, and went on:
					
					 His leadership over the WPK brought about a landmark turn in strengthening the party and carrying out the revolutionary cause of Juche and helped give steady continuity to the sacred history of the WPK which inherited the tradition of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.
					
					 Already from the very day he started his work at the Party Central Committee he enunciated with originality the idea of party-building centred on the leader, resolutely smashed the anti-party and counter-revolutionary moves of enemies of all hues and ceaselessly developed in depth the work for establishing the party's monolithic ideological system.
					
					 He formulated the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung as Kimilsungism and regarded the modeling of the whole society on Kimilsungism as the supreme programme of the party and modeling of the whole party on Kimilsungism as the general goal of the party-building. This marked a special event as they indicated a clear-cut way for developing the work for establishing the party's monolithic ideological system on a new high stage and turning the party into an eternal party of the leader.
					
					 He successfully achieved the single-minded unity of the leader, the party and masses with his benevolent politics of love and trust and all-embracing politics and turned the whole society into a great harmonious socialist family.
					
					 During the whole period of the revolutionary leadership he made sure that the leadership principle, method and art of Juche were thoroughly embodied in the party work and activities and put his great heart and soul into raising the leadership function and role of the party in every way in all fields of socialist construction.
					
					 He formulated the Songun politics as a socialist main political mode and the party's revolutionary leadership mode by embodying the President's idea and line of attaching importance to the army and further strengthened the WPK as a political organization steering the Songun revolution.
					
					 His Juche-based party-building exploits are being successfully carried forward by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The reporter called for more thoroughly establishing the monolithic leadership system of Kim Jong Un throughout the whole party and society to consolidate the party's unity and cohesion, revolutionary legacy of Kim Jong Il, as firm as a rock and steadily cement the blood ties between the party and masses.
					
					 No force on earth can hold in check the advance of the army and people of the DPRK dashing ahead like the wind for the final victory under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, the reporter stressed.
					
					 Similar meetings took place in each province, city and county.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Peruvian Organization
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Peruvian Organization
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was present a floral basket by the Peruvian Committee for Remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il on Thursday on the occasion of the 51st anniversary of his start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Joint Meeting with Disabled Persons Held
articles.content:
Joint Meeting with Disabled Persons Held
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- A joint meeting was held here on Thursday on National Day of Persons with Disabilities in 2015.
					 Present there were Minister of Public Health Kang Ha Guk, chairman of the Central Committee of the Korean Federation for the Protection of the Disabled, officials concerned, disabled persons and their families, Pyongyangites, members of missions of international bodies such as the European Union Programme Support, foreign diplomatic envoys and staff members of their embassies here and overseas Koreans staying in the homeland.
					
					 There were sports and amusement events. 
					
					 Taekwon-Do game by deaf persons, making the round of a hurdle with eyes blindfolded, disabled children's picking of toys and other events revved up the atmosphere. 
					
					 Then followed a performance presented by university students and an art group of disabled persons.
					
					 Put on the stage were piano solo "Voice of My Heart", kayagum solo "Pyongyang Nalpharam", dance trio and other diverse numbers.
					
					 Prior to the meeting, the participants looked round photos showing the successes made in the DPRK for the protection of the disabled persons.

articles.title: Concert Given by Participants in Int'l Juvenile Chopin Piano Contest
articles.content:
Concert Given by Participants in Int'l Juvenile Chopin Piano Contest
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- A concert was given at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club by the participants in the 23rd International Juvenile Chopin Piano Contest on Thursday. 
					 Among the audience were members of the Korea-Poland Friendship Association including Vice-Chairman Ryu Kyong Il, officials concerned, teachers of art educational institutions, Polish Ambassador to the DPRK Krzysztof Ciebien and his embassy officials and foreign diplomatic envoys and members of missions of international organizations here.
					
					 Hong Su Ryon and Ko Yun Mi who had received special prize and the third prize at the contest held in Poland in last May presented excellent rendition of Korean music and works of Chopin.

articles.title: Sea Tangle Harvest in DPRK
articles.content:
Sea Tangle Harvest in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The harvest of sea tangle is in full swing at fishery stations and offshore farms on the eastern and western coasts of the DPRK.
					 Offshore farms under the South Hwanghae Provincial Fishery Management Bureau are now gathering a large amount of sea tangle with the will to contribute to the improvement of people's dietary life.
					
					 Workers of the Kim Chaek Fishery Station under the North Hamgyong Provincial Fishery Management Bureau, too concentrate their efforts on the harvest and processing of sea tangle.
					
					 The same goes for fishery stations under the South Hamgyong Provincial Fishery Management Bureau.

articles.title: Recuperation, Relaxation Systems in DPRK
articles.content:
Recuperation, Relaxation Systems in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Sanatoriums and rest homes in different parts of the DPRK are now crowded with working people enjoying pleasant days.
					 Every year hundreds of thousands of citizens would enjoy themselves at those sanatoriums and rest homes under the recuperation and relaxation systems which include 15-day recuperation, 30-day recuperation, 5-day relaxation and 15-day relaxation at the state expense.
					
					 The recuperation and relaxation systems were provided by President Kim Il Sung.                           
					
					 On December 19, Juche 35 (1946), Kim Il Sung underscored the need to build many rest homes and sanatoriums across the country in his speech at a meeting of the Presidium of the Provisional People's Committee of North Korea. After that he took government steps for the recuperation and relaxation systems.
					
					 Consequently, more than ten sanatoriums and rest homes began their service in April 1947.
					
					 The systems were enforced without interruption even in the period of the Fatherland Liberation War (June 1950-July 1953).
					
					 On February 5, 1951, Kim Il Sung gave an instruction on restoring the war-destroyed rest homes and sanatoriums and running them on a normal basis.
					
					 As a result night sanatoriums and frontline sanatoriums appeared at factories, collieries and mines and frontline units.
					
					 Even in the period of the Arduous March, the forced march when the country was in hard time, leader Kim Jong Il took measures to build more rest homes and sanatoriums on the scenic spots of the country.
					
					 Today people in the DPRK enjoy the state benefit at those rest homes and sanatoriums under the warm care of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kumdang-2 Injection
articles.content:
Kumdang-2 Injection
ã€€Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Kumdang-2 Injection developed by the Korea Pugang Pharmaceutic Co., Ltd is believed to be efficacious for different epidemics.
					 In this regard KCNA met Dr. Jon Sung Hun, director of the company.
					
					 Jon said:
					
					 The researchers insert rare earth elements (REE) into insam (ginseng) by applying the micro-elementary fertilizers of REE to the fields of insam. Inside the herbal body of insam the REE had got combined with the saccharides into desired complex compounds.
					
					 The injection is made of extracts from those complex compounds.
					
					 As a strong immuno-activator, the injection has been recognized to prevent different malignant epidemics.

articles.title: DPRK Scholar Hits at Japan's Distortion of Past History
articles.content:
DPRK Scholar Hits at Japan's Distortion of Past History
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- A Japanese ultra-rightist politician recently sent parcels to victims of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army residing in south Korea. The parcel contained a box written "fifth grade supplies" that means prostitutes providing sex to servicemen.
					 Such another insulting deed is now lashing the Koreans and other world people into great furor.
					
					 This reveals again the Japanese reactionaries' scheme to distort the past history of aggression and grab other countries' territories, Dr. Jon Tong Chol of Kim Il Sung University told KCNA.
					
					 He further said:
					
					The Japanese imperialists took away 200,000 women from Korea by exercise of government power and forced them into sexual slavery for their aggression troops at battle sites. It was a hideous crime against humanity that is unprecedented in the world history of wars.
					
					 However, Japan has denied this stark fact and made insults to the victims of the sex slavery despite the bitter criticism by the world community calling for honest apology and repentance.
					
					 Some of Japan's right-wing politicians stunned the international community with such assertions that the sexual slavery was necessary at that time, it was a "voluntary deed by prostitutes for money" and the issue should be handled at a meeting of historians and experts.
					
					 Also hooligans of Japan made attacks on the monuments to the sex slaves and buildings related to them in different parts of the world, evoking strong public criticism.
					
					 All those provocative actions were evidently prompted by the ultra-rightist politicians and reactionary organizations of Japan.
					
					 The facts show that Japan is now running headlong toward the extreme right and militarism.
					
					 Some days ago, more than 400 renowned historians of the world and 16 organizations of Japan issued statements urging Japanese Prime Minister Abe to stop the distortion of history related to the sexual slavery.
					
					 And more than 280 intellectuals of Japan strongly demanded on June 8 that the government should admit the state responsibility for the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					
					 Japan should discard its wrong outlook on ethics and history and pay attention to the just demand of domestic and world public.

articles.title: S. Korean Personage Stresses Historic Significance of June 15 Joint Declaration
articles.content:
S. Korean Personage Stresses Historic Significance of June 15 Joint Declaration
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Jaju Sibo on June 15 carried an article titled "Historic significance of June 15 South-North Joint Declaration" written by Ri Jun Yong, permanent researcher of the "Institute for Our Society". 
					 The article said the June 15 joint declaration was the start of the movement which helped the south and the north of Korea remove conflict, achieve reconciliation and advance toward reunification from separation. 
					
					 In the joint declaration the south and the north agreed to independently solve the issue of national reunification by pooling efforts of the Korean nation responsible for it and this means the driving force for reunification is the Korean nation in the south and the north, the article said, and went on: 
					
					 It was very important that national reconciliation and cooperation were declared at home and abroad to be a primary task in the reunification issue. 
					
					 In the joint declaration the south and the north admitted that the south-proposed confederation and the north-proposed low-level federation have commonness, and agreed to orientate reunification toward this. 
					
					 Exchange and cooperation in different fields together with economic cooperation which deepened confidence between the south and the north formed a foundation which makes the reunification of the country an irretrievable trend. 
					
					 Even now when the south-north relations faced a total stalemate, we call the June 15 south-north joint declaration a "landmark for reunification" as we witnessed the inter-Korean relations which underwent a great change after the publication of the joint declaration. 
					
					 The significance of the June 15 joint declaration is that it made the inheritance of the spirit to the October 4 declaration possible.

articles.title: Pomminryon South Headquarters Calls for Holding High Banner of June 15 Joint Declaration
articles.content:
Pomminryon South Headquarters Calls for Holding High Banner of June 15 Joint Declaration
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) issued a statement on June 12 calling for actions for frustrating outside forces and pro-U.S. conservative regime's moves to escalate the confrontation by the concerted efforts of the nation under the uplifted banner of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 The statement noted:
					
					 The present regime aborted the joint national event marking the 15th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration, thus going against all Koreans' will for reunification. 
					
					 The conservative regime denied the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and brought the north-south relations back to the era of all-out confrontation by tightening alliance with outside forces, staging anti-north nuclear war drills and blocking national cooperation and exchange. 
					
					 The way out for the Korean nation is to embody the spirit of By Our Nation Itself.

articles.title: MERS Disaster Increases in S. Korea
articles.content:
MERS Disaster Increases in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- 8 MERS cases and one casualty were reported in south Korea on June 17, according to the south Korean MBC.
					The total number of MERS cases reached 162, that of cases isolated more than 6,500 and that of the dead more than 20 up to now.

articles.title: Korean Bodies in China Mark 15th Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration
articles.content:
Korean Bodies in China Mark 15th Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Organizations under the General Association of Koreans in China held events on June 14 to mark the 15th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration. 
					 There took place in Yanji a pledge-making meeting of the Yanbian Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China. 
					
					 The full text of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration was read out at the meeting. 
					
					 Speakers at the meeting recalled that eye-opening successes unimaginable in the past were achieved in the movement for national reunification under the banner of By Our Nation Itself in the June 15 era and the climate of national reconciliation, unity and cooperation prevailed throughout Korea and the validity and vitality of the joint declaration were fully demonstrated all over the world. 
					
					 They expressed the will to more dynamically work to open up a wide avenue to independent reunification this significant year marking the 70th anniversary of the liberation of Korea in the belief that national reunification would surely be achieved thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 At the end of the meeting the participants watched the Korean film "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Jong Il Meets President Kim Dae Jung". 
					
					 On the same day round-table talks, seminars and other diverse events took place to mark the anniversary in branches of the regional associations of the General Association of Koreans in China.

articles.title: Anniversary of North-South Joint Declaration Observed by Korean Magazine in Russia
articles.content:
Anniversary of North-South Joint Declaration Observed by Korean Magazine in Russia 
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Thongil, monthly socio-political magazine of the International United Confederation of Koreans, carried a special write-up on June 11 on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 It was illustrated with a photo of leader Kim Jong Il meeting with former south Korean President Kim Dae Jung.
					
					 It edited the full text of the joint declaration.
					
					 It carried the following article under the headline "On the occasion of the 15th anniversary of the adoption of the June 15 joint declaration between the north and the south of Korea":
					
					 A historic event took place in Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK, on June 15, 2000.
					
					 A north-south summit took place for the first time in the history of national division and June 15 joint declaration was adopted there.
					
					 The keynote of the joint declaration is to solve the issue of Korea's reunification in an independent and peaceful way.
					
					 The past relations between the north and the south go to prove that if they support and implement the joint declaration, they can head for reconciliation, unity and peace and reunification but if it is denied and scrapped, this will only spark discontent and clash.
					
					 The past relations between the north and the south proved that they can advance toward reconciliation, unity, peace and reunification when they support and implement the joint declaration, but denying and scraping it would bring discontent and conflict.
					
					 The magazine also carried an article titled "DPRK calls for intensified struggle for reunification of the north and the south."

articles.title: Koreans in U.S. Call for Punishment of Dictator in S. Korea
articles.content:
Koreans in U.S. Call for Punishment of Dictator in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. on June 10 released a statement calling for the second June resistance to punish the south Korean conservative group.
					 Independence, democracy and desire for national reunification are being trampled down in south Korea by the dictatorial rule worse than the military dictatorial regime 28 years ago, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The inter-Korean relations have deteriorated due to the wild ambition for "unification through absorption".
					
					 Madcap joint military drills targeting the DPRK such as Key Resolve, Foal Eagle and Ulji Freedom Guardian are increasing the danger of war.
					
					 By conniving at the U.S. moves for a bio-chemical warfare in south Korea the present regime brought to light its treacherous scenario to exterminate the Korean nation in league with outside forces.

articles.title: Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration Marked by Koreans in Kyrgyzstan
articles.content:
Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration Marked by Koreans in Kyrgyzstan
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in Kyrgyzstan held a meeting at the Korean Center in Bishkek on June 14 on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bunches of flowers before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Pak Kyong Ho, chairman of the confederation, said that the publication of the June 15 joint declaration was a historic event that opened up a new era of national reconciliation, unity, reunification, peace and prosperity. 
					
					 The past days go to clearly prove that the wide road of peace, reunification and national prosperity will be opened in the inter-Korean relations only when the June 15 joint declaration agreed by the north and the south is carried out, but distrust, confrontation and war will be brought if the joint declaration is denied, he noted, adding: 
					
					 Implementing the north-south joint declarations guarantees a bright future of the nation and it is the only way of tiding over difficulties.
					
					 He called for making positive contribution to the patriotic work for the country's reunification and prosperity under the uplifted banner of By Our Nation Itself, the basic idea of the June 15 joint declaration. 
					
					 There was a performance given by Korean artistes.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Day Observed in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Day Observed in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries on the occasion of the 51st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 A meeting was held by the Communist Party of Germany, a meeting and photo exhibition by Makerere University of Uganda, a book exhibition and film show in Zamfara State of Nigeria and a film show by a trading company of Indonesia from June 8 to 12.
					
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos documenting the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Books and photos introducing the prospering DPRK were also on display.
					
					 Films shown included a Korean film "My Country Winning Victories Thanks to Single-minded Unity".
					
					 The chairman of the Communist Party of Germany said that Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into the party of Kim Il Sung, the Juche-type revolutionary party regarding the Juche idea as the only guidelines and the popular party deeply rooted among the people.
					
					 The chairman of the Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement and other speakers said:
					
					 The DPRK is demonstrating its might as the invincible socialist fortress thanks to the Songun politics of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It serves as a precious example to be followed by the people of Uganda and Africa in their struggle for building a new society.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Personages of Bangladesh, Guinea
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Personages of Bangladesh, Guinea
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Personages of Bangladesh and Guinea issued statements on June 9 and 12 on the occasion of the 51st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Riyad Chaloub, chairman of the Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, said that Kim Jong Il made a great contribution to the cause of party building for five decades since he started his work at the WPK Central Committee. The chairman went on:
					
					 He developed and enriched the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung, glorified it as the guiding idea in the era of independence and firmly defended socialism by overcoming all difficulties by dint of Songun.
					
					  He developed the WPK into the ideological integral whole, the party which achieved the firm unity and cohesion and the genuine mother party which serves the people.
					
					 M. Jahangir Khan, chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy, said that progressive people of the world are paying the highest respect to Kim Jong Il who provided a powerful treasured sword for accomplishing the global cause of independence.

articles.title: Special Bulletin "Star of Independence" Issued by British Institution
articles.content:
Special Bulletin "Star of Independence" Issued by British Institution
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a special bulletin "Star of independence" on June 9.
					 The bulletin carried articles illustrated with a portrait of smiling leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The bulletin noted that his start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea on June 19, 1964 marked a historic event of great significance in the history of the Juche-oriented party building and the WPK. 
					
					 It noted that under his leadership the Korean revolution pioneered on Mt. Paektu could emerge victorious and the WPK demonstrate its dignity as the party of President Kim Il Sung, founder of the party, and a guide leading socialist Korea to victory and prosperity.
					
					 It carried the main contents of his work "Giving Priority to Ideological Work Is Essential for Accomplishing Socialism" and said that the work is precious guidelines giving perfect answers to important problems arising in socialist construction and a book the adherents of the Juche idea and the world revolutionaries must read.
					
					 It also said that the publication of the north-south joint declaration was an epochal event in the Korean people's movement for the reunification of the divided country.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days to Be Marked in Asia-Pacific Region
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days to Be Marked in Asia-Pacific Region
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- An Asia-Pacific regional preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th anniversaries of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the liberation of Korea was formed on June 8.
					 Madav Kumar Nepal, former prime minister of Nepal, and Rachmawati Soekarnoputri, chairperson of the Founding Committee of the Soekarno Foundation for Education of Indonesia, were elected honorary chairpersons of the preparatory committee and Peter Woods, co-chairman of the Asia-Pacific Regional Committee for Supporting Peaceful Reunification of Korea, Fumihiro Himori, chairman of the Japan Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, Amar Jit Malhotra, former senator of Pakistan, and Rashed Khan Menon, chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, were elected co-chairpersons of the committee.
					
					 Personages of various circles from India, Vietnam, Philippines, Thailand, Sri Lanka, Mongolia and other countries are among members of the committee.

articles.title: Romanian Political Party Supports Korean People's Efforts for Country's Reunification
articles.content:
Romanian Political Party Supports Korean People's Efforts for Country's Reunification
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The Socialist Party of Romania posted an article on its website on June 10 to observe the 15th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The article said:
					
					 The joint declaration which was adopted in the idea of By Our Nation Itself indicates the ways and methods for ensuring peace on the Korean peninsula and reunifying the country independently and peacefully free from foreign interference.
					
					 Thanks to the experienced and seasoned leadership of great HE Kim Jong Il, eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, a north-south summit was held for the first time in history, at which the June 15 joint declaration, a landmark for Korea's reunification, was adopted as an event to be specially recorded in history.
					
					 The adoption of the declaration brought about multi-lateral cooperation and exchange between the north and the south of Korea in all fields and paved a broad avenue toward reunification.
					
					 Korea will be surely reunified in the spirit of the joint declaration thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Egyptian Political Figure Demands GIs' Withdrawal from South Korea
articles.content:
Egyptian Political Figure Demands GIs' Withdrawal from South Korea
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Wahid Al Uksouri, chairman of the Arab Socialist Party of Egypt, in a statement on June 10 demanded the U.S. pull its forces, a main obstacle to Korea's reunification, out of south Korea as early as possible.
					 The statement said:
					
					 It is the unanimous long-cherished desire of all Koreans to reunify the divided country independently and peacefully.
					
					 But the desire has not yet come true, 70 years since Korea's division, inflicting untold misfortunes and pain on the Korean people.
					
					 This is attributable to the U.S. forces present in south Korea, the policies of the successive U.S. administrations seeking Korea's division and the behavior of the south Korean authorities kowtowing to them.
					
					 We extend firm solidarity to the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people in their efforts for protecting the sovereignty of the country and reunifying the country.

articles.title: Anniversary of North-South Declaration Observed by Foreign Bodies
articles.content:
Anniversary of North-South Declaration Observed by Foreign Bodies
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Organizations of South Africa and Nigeria posted articles on their websites to observe the 15th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The South African Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in an article titled "By Our Nation Itself" said:
					
					 The June 15 North-South Joint Declaration, a landmark for Korea's reunification, was published in Pyongyang in 2000.
					
					 The strong spirit of independence runs through the idea of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 The U.S. doesn't hope the north and the south getting reconciled with each other and heading for reunification in unity. So, it prevents them in every way from doing so.
					
					 Not only the reunification and prosperity of the Korean nation but the regional and global peace and security can be ensured only when the idea of By Our Nation Itself is held fast to and implemented.
					
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in an article urged the U.S. to make a bold switchover in its policy, not resorting to anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK and reckless moves for aggression.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should opt for defusing tension and creating peaceful atmosphere on the Korean peninsula, not kowtowing to outsiders, the article added.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by British Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by British Organization
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea carried leader Kim Jong Il's work "Giving Priority to Ideological Work Is Essential for Accomplishing Socialism" in its special bulletin on June 9.
					 The work, published on June 19, Juche 84 (1995), clarifies the idea that in order to successfully accomplish the socialist cause it is necessary to give definite priority to the ideological work with a firm hold on it. It also says that the basic task of the ideological work is to imbue the whole society with the socialist idea and that the ideological work should be conducted on the basis of the principle and method suited to the intrinsic requirements of socialism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un se fotografia con funcionarios de exploracion e inteligencia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un se fotografia con funcionarios de exploracion e inteligencia
Pyongyang, 18 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea ,se fotografio con los participantes en la Primera Conferencia de los Funcionarios de Exploracion  del EPC.
					El Mariscal evaluo mucho a los funcionarios de exploracion e inteligencia y los combatientes que dejan huellas claras de su vida en defender el frente mas dificil y peligroso, encargado por el Partido, al dedicar hasta su juventud, familia y vida.
					
					Ellos, que dedican toda su sabiduria y entusiasmo sin esperar ningun honor y evaluacion, son firmes revolucionarios y verdaderas raices de nuestro Partido, dijo y continuo que los meritos de ellos que defienden con firmeza la patria socialista seran eternos en la memoria del Partido, la patria y el pueblo.
					
					El Mariscal senalo que la Primera Conferencia de los Funcionarios de Exploracion del EPC sirve de una oportunidad importante que permite abrir una coyuntura de viraje en mantener y glorificar para siempre las hazanas de los Grandes Lideres acumuladas en la rama y mejorar y fortalecer su labor segun la demanda de la aguda situacion.
					
					Y felicito a los participantes que concluyeron con exito la conferencia y tomo foto de recuerdo junto con ellos.
					
					Le acompanaron Hwang Pyong So, Pak Yong Sik, Ri Yong Gil, Ryom Chol Song, Kim Yong Chol y Kim Rak Jun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia competencia de tiro de artilleros antiaereos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia competencia de tiro de artilleros antiaereos
Pyongyang, 18 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, presencio la competencia de tiro de los artilleros antiaereos.
					En la ocasion tomaron parte las companias de artilleros antiaereos adscritas a las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas y a las grandes unidades combinadas 963 y 526 y las companias compuestas por los profesores y cadetes de la Escuela de Oficiales Artilleros Antiaereos.
					
					La competencia fue efectuada con el metodo de competir por la victoria con el numero de impactos en los blancos moviles aereos, terrestres y maritimos, utilizando los canones antiaereos de diferentes calibres segun el turno de tiro por unidades definido por sorteo.
					
					En el puesto de vigilancia, el Mariscal recibio el parte de la forma y el metodo de la competencia y dio la orden de inicio de tiro.
					
					En la competencia, la Escuela de Oficiales Artilleros Antiaereos ocupo el primer lugar en total.
					
					El Comandante Supremo evaluo a los profesores y cadetes de la Escuela, calificandola como unidad modelo digno de enorgullecerse en todas esferas y se fotografio junto con  ellos.
					
					Dijo que ordeno participar particularmente a los profesores de la Escuela porque cuando los profesores del organo de educacion militar se preparen firmemente en lo teorico y lo practico pueden formar a los verdaderos oficiales de combate.
					
					El Mariscal expreso satisfaccion de la exitosa competencia efectuada en medio del elevado entusiasmo de los participantes.
					
					En lo adelante, el EPC debe establecer el plan de utilizar bien los canones antiaereos, dijo y exhorto a mejorar sin cesar el metodo de educacion y entrenamiento para materializar cabalmente la orientacion del Partido en materia de convertir el EPC en el ejercito poderoso especializado en todos los metodos de combate y todas las armas.
					
					Para formar a los uniformados como artilleros certeros en cualquier condicion y ambiente, deben hacer el entrenamiento como en el combate real y cientifizarlo y modernizarlo y profundizar constantemente la emulacion por unidades y subunidades, enfatizo.
					
					Subrayo reiteradamente que lo principal en el fortalecimiento del poderio militar es el entrenamiento y presento las tareas para fortalecer por todos los medios los preparativos de combate y la combatividad del EPC.
					
					Le acompanaron Choe Ryong Hae y O Il Jong.

articles.title: Tiene lugar acto central por 51o aniversario de inicio de trabajo de Kim Jong Il en CC de PTC
articles.content:
Tiene lugar acto central por 51o aniversario de inicio de trabajo de Kim Jong Il en CC de PTC
Pyongyang, 18 de junio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este jueves en esta capital el acto central por el 51o aniversario del inicio del trabajo del Dirigente Kim Jong Il en el Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea. 
					Asistieron Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, los del Consejo de Ministros, entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, heroes, personas que fueron recibidas por el Dirigente y los ameritados, funcionarios de los organismos, fabricas y empresas de la capital.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del PTC. 
					
					El orador dijo que el 19 de junio, dia de inicio del trabajo del Dirigente en el Comite Central del PTC, Supremo Estado Mayor de la revolucion coreana, es junto con el 10 de octubre el dia de gran jubilo revolucionario y de gran importancia historica en el desarrollo del PTC y la revolucion coreana.
					
					Este acontecimiento historico permitio registrar un cambio trascendental en el desarrollo del PTC y en el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche y continuar ininterrumpidamente la sagrada historia del PTC que hereda la tradicion de la Union para Derrotar al Imperialismo, dijo y continuo:
					
					Desde el comienzo de su trabajo en el Comite Central del PTC, el Dirigente aclaro originalmente la idea de construccion del partido en torno al lider y profundizo constantemente la labor para establecer el sistema de unica ideologia del partido frustrando las maniobras anti-partido y antirrevolucionarias de los enemigos. 
					
					Definio la idea revolucionaria del Presidente Kim Il Sung como el kimilsungismo y presento la transformacion de toda la sociedad segun el kimilsungismo como maxima programa del partido, y la transformacion de todo el partido segun la misma doctrina como la meta final de la construccion del partido. 
					
					Con la politica abarcadora de amor, confianza y beneficios populares logro la unidad monolitica entre el lider, el partido y las masas populares y convirtio toda la sociedad en la gran familia socialista armoniosa. 
					
					Durante todo el periodo de su direccion revolucionaria, hizo materializar los principios, metodos y arte de direccion de tipo jucheano en las labores y actividades partidistas, de modo que se elevaran al maximo la funcion y el papel directivos del partido en todos los dominios de la construccion socialista. 
					
					Al materializar la idea y la linea del Presidente de dar importancia a las fuerzas armadas, definio la politica de Songun como principal modo politico socialista y modo de direccion revolucionaria del partido, y desarrollo el PTC como organizacion politica directiva de la revolucion del Songun. 
					
					Las proezas del Dirigente realizadas en la construccion del partido de tipo jucheano se llevan adelante hoy por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Es necesario establecer mas estrictamente en todo el partido y toda la sociedad el sistema de unica direccion del Mariscal para consolidar mas la unidad monolitica del partido, herencia revolucionaria del Dirigente, y fortalecer incesantemente los lazos consanguineos entre el partido y las masas. 
					
					Nadie en este mundo puede detener el avance de los militares y civiles coreanos que marchan a galopes hacia la victoria final bajo la orientacion del Mariscal.
					
					Los actos similares se realizaron tambien en todas las provincias, ciudades y distritos.
